Header: Suspects arrested in Puttalam for illegal transport of cattle
Content: Suspects in connection with the illegal transportation of a herd of cows via a lorry in Kottukatchchiya, Puttalam were arrested by the Police Special Task force at dawn on Monday. The raid was conducted following a tip off received by the Police Special Task force. Two suspects and a lorry were taken into the custody of the police. The Puttalam police has launched further investigations into the incident.
